Instrument.name: Mars Orbiter Camera
Instrument.description: The Mars Observer Camera (MOC) was initially developed as part of the Mars Observer instrument complement. After the loss of MO, the MOC flight spare was completed and flown on the Mars Global Surveyor spacecraft. To avoid a confusing change of acronym, the instrument on MGS is called the Mars Orbiter Camera, but is often referred to internally to the MOC project as MOC2.
